reviews.review_text: If youu2019ve ever wanted to experiment with a vibrator I would definitely recommend this one. It has so many different modes for you to chose from so you get exactly what youu2019re looking for. Super soft and quiet as well which is a plus

reviews.review_text: This is a must-have vibrator in 2024...whether you are single or in a relationship, this is an essential. It has 9 different vibrating modes and each seem pretty quiet so far. It came fully charged and ready to go and it's a great size. The curved top and the ribbed body is also really nice. 10/10 recommend!

reviews.review_title: a good toy for people who prefer internal stim
reviews.review_text: * I was gifted this in exchange for my honest review. *  I've tried a lot of adult items in the past couple years and was a bit skeptical about this one when I saw it. It's an insertable vibe, and I'm mostly used to seeing either combo toys or vibing ones that are for external use. I had my doubts, because I'm in a commited relationship with my rabbit-style one, but this still had some impressive qualities. It is bigger than I expected, both in length and in width, but it's silicone so as long as you use some looob you should be good to go. This was too long for me personally, but i thought it was nice for the shallower parts that I was able to use it for. It has a nice thrust-eeng setting that was unexpected, but the vibe can get pretty strong so just be aware!!

It's rechargable, lasts a long time, and it's very quiet. If you are wanting to advance your vibe skills, this would also be a good vibe to graduate to. Love it!
